text: The 2016–17 season was Al-Ettifaq Football Club's 72nd season in existence and first season in the Pro League since their relegation in the 2013–14 season; after gaining promotion last year. Along with the Pro League, the club also competed in the Crown Prince Cup and the King Cup. The season covered the period from 1 July 2016 to 30 June 2017. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ==Transfers== ===In=== ====Summer==== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable"
